name: Slime Simulator - DIY ASMR
description:
Play with the most satisfying ASMR super slime on your mobile devices just like you do with real slime ! Smash, stretch and pop it!
Enjoy that satisfying feeling without the mess or money!

FEATURES
* Create your own slime and have fun
*Enjoy the most satisfying slime simulator
*Interact and move your finger around the screen and play with the squishy slime
*Stretch it, squish it and pop it with wide variety of slimes
*Real and amazing effects with textures
*Best anti stress satisfying hand DIY slime
*Large collection of slimes with textures and colors
*Added best looking glitter decoration in the game
